about_me_intro: Hello! I'm Sebastián Chacón, a software engineer with Full Stack development experience.
about_me_experience: I have 3 years of experience, during which I've developed web and mobile applications, scalable APIs, and artificial intelligence research projects, including an LSTM-based system for real-time Peruvian Sign Language translation.
about_me_interests: I'm particularly interested in applied artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and the design of inclusive solutions with social impact. I'm also passionate about humanities, which allows me to integrate a critical and ethical perspective into technological development.
about_me_values: I value continuous learning, team collaboration, and developing technology that can improve people's lives.
montly_expenses_description: Application to record and visualize monthly income and expenses. Data and session state are stored persistently using browser storage. Includes support for light and dark themes.
three_demo_description: Interactive 3D water simulation demo with collision and noise effects.
kanban_board_description: Interactive board to manage tasks in columns with drag-and-drop support. It also supports theming
graph_demo_description: Tool to plot mathematical functions on an interactive canvas.
signapp_description: Mobile application that translates Peruvian Sign Language gestures into text in real time. The frontend connects to the backend via Socket.IO, sending raw images that are preprocessed and grouped into a sequence of movements. This sequence is then processed by an LSTM model that returns an approximate translation.
weather_app_description: Graphical interface that adapts its color scheme based on weather conditions. It currently uses simulated data to avoid external dependencies but supports integration with real-time data sources.
creds_updt_description: Interface and rest api to update credentials with validation and security confirmation.
projects_disclaimer: These are just the public projects. Most of them have the code available, except one that belongs to an institution.
